meanings.sent1: After the rain stopped, I had to rewet the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: If you spill water on the table, just rewet the cloth and clean it up.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rewet my hair right after blow-drying it!
meanings.sent4: The sudden downpour rewet the dried-up river, bringing life back to its banks.
meanings.sent5: She used a spray bottle to rewet the paintbrush before continuing her artwork.

meanings.sent1: The towel will rewet quickly if you leave it out in the rain.
meanings.sent2: If you leave the clothes outside, they will rewet when it starts raining.
meanings.sent3: The cat shook itself, trying to rewet its fur after getting wet in the bath.
meanings.sent4: The desert rewet with the rare rainfall, transforming into a lush oasis.
meanings.sent5: The sponge will rewet as soon as you put it back in the water.
